title: A lesson in logic
author: VD
content_html:
GP doesn’t think through the numbers:

“Bad analogy. Abortionettes pose no threat to the broader society the way convicted murderers do.”

Actually, an average of 750,000 annual abortions has created the apparent need for mass immigration of around 30 million legal and illegal immigrants. This has had a far greater, more ultimately fatal effect on American society than 16,000 annual murders.

In fact, allowing murderers to go unpunished by the government is almost surely a smaller long-term social problem than permitting abortion.
content_text:
GP doesn’t think through the numbers:
“Bad analogy. Abortionettes pose no threat to the broader society the way convicted murderers do.”
Actually, an average of 750,000 annual abortions has created the apparent need for mass immigration of around 30 million legal and illegal immigrants.  This has had a far greater, more ultimately fatal effect on American society than 16,000 annual murders.
In fact, allowing murderers to go unpunished by the government is almost surely a smaller long-term social problem than permitting abortion.
